job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: DESCRIPTION             br	These contingent workers will work closely with fulltime research scientists and software engineers who are leadingbr	computer vision research projects to ensure that the process runs smoothly and that data annotation quality remains high tobr	train stateoftheart machine learning models Duties includebr	Data wrangling writing data pipelines to upload annotations automatically running existing ML models on large volumes ofbr	data adhoc data analysis  visualizationbrbrAnnotation task and vendor management br	creating data annotation guidelines curating ideal gold standard examples for annotatorsbr	managing backandforth communications with annotators reviewing annotation quality to identify themes andbr	relaying appropriate feedback to annotation vendorsbrbrSkills requiredbr	SQL Python Linux command line Bashbr	Very high attention to detail for managing large complex annotation effortsbr	Good written communication skills to coordinate with annotators and team membersbr	2 years work experience including experience working with customer teamsbrbrTop musthave HARD skillsbr	SQL and Python is a needbr	Linux command linebrbrTop 3 goodtohave skillsbr	Great communicationbr	Understanding of AI models would be greatbrbrInterview LoopProcessbr	2 coding interviews and 1 general interviewbr	PDF homeworkoffline analysis will submit the answers along with their resumebr
